member.summary: Hide the constructor, there should only be one loggin interceptor

member.summary: Form,at and write a message out to each trace sink
member.param: string.Format message format
additional arguments to the format

member.summary: Stop the interceptor from logging messages

name of config item
value of config item

implementing instance of the operation
Name of the method being called
Parameters passed in the method call, keyed by parameter name

member.summary: Trace the throwing of an exception by a WAML client

Exception raised

member.summary: Trace a WAML method exit

Return value from the method

member.summary: Trace a response received by a WAML client

The raw response data
